scrooge:scrooge

Full name:

com.github.mkroli:scrooge-maven-plugin:0.1-SNAPSHOT:scrooge

Description:

Generates classes from thrift-idl files using the scrooge compiler.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-sources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
language String - The language of the generated source files (either "java" or "scala")
Default value is: java.
User property is: scrooge.language.
outputDirectory File - Directory where the generated source files are created.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/thrift.
thriftDirectory File - Directory containing the thrift-idl files.
Default value is: ${project.basedir}/src/main/thrift.
withFinagleClient boolean - Whether an Finagle client should be created.
Default value is: true.
withFinagleService boolean - Whether an Finagle service should be created.
Default value is: true.
withOstrichServer boolean - Whether an Ostrich server should be created.
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

language:

The language of the generated source files (either "java" or "scala")
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: scrooge.language
  • Default: java

outputDirectory:

Directory where the generated source files are created.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/thrift

thriftDirectory:

Directory containing the thrift-idl files.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.basedir}/src/main/thrift

withFinagleClient:

Whether an Finagle client should be created.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: true

withFinagleService:

Whether an Finagle service should be created.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: true

withOstrichServer:

Whether an Ostrich server should be created.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: false
